title: Self-Hosted Stack
subtitle: Running on my Homelab
description: Proudly running these on my 2-node Proxmox cluster

apps.name: Nextcloud
apps.description: Self-hosted file sync & collaboration platform with calendars, contacts, and document preview.

apps.name: Pelican
apps.description: Static site generator powering lightweight personal sites and documentation.

apps.name: AzuraCast
apps.description: Self-hosted web radio management — streaming, automation and station management.

apps.name: Element/Matrix
apps.description: Matrix client and decentralized messaging stack for secure communications.

apps.name: Proxmox VE
apps.description: Virtualization platform that hosts VMs and containers across the 2-node cluster.

apps.name: AdGuard Home
apps.description: Network-level ad and tracker blocking for locally connected devices.

apps.name: Immich
apps.description: Self-hosted photo and video backup with privacy-first syncing and quick sharing.

apps.name: Grafana
apps.description: Metrics and dashboarding platform used to visualise monitoring data.

apps.name: Uptime Kuma
apps.description: Lightweight self-hosted uptime monitor with alerts for service outages.

apps.name: n8n
apps.description: Workflow automation tool used to connect services and automate repetitive tasks.

apps.name: Radarr
apps.description: Movie download manager and organizer integrated with indexers and download clients.

apps.name: Sonarr
apps.description: TV series download manager with automated search and organization features.

apps.name: Prowlarr
apps.description: Indexer manager that centralizes indexers for other media automation tools.

apps.name: Baikal
apps.description: Lightweight CalDAV/CardDAV server for contacts and calendars on self-hosted stacks.

apps.name: Etherpad
apps.description: Collaborative real-time editor for notes and simple document collaboration.

apps.name: Portainer
apps.description: Container management UI for Docker and Kubernetes used to manage workloads.

apps.name: Docker
apps.description: Container runtime used as the basis for many self-hosted services.

apps.name: Nginx Proxy
apps.description: Reverse proxy and TLS termination routing traffic to services in the cluster.

apps.name: Zabbix
apps.description: Infrastructure monitoring and alerting — full Zabbix stack for hosts, network devices, and services.

apps.name: OwnTracks
apps.description: Privacy-first location reporting for personal devices; used for presence, geofencing and personal automations.

apps.name: Zipline
apps.description: Small internal tooling service (delivery/automation helper) used for quick job dispatch and simple webhooks.

apps.name: Kutt
apps.description: Self-hosted URL shortener for quick links and sharing; supports custom aliases and stats.

apps.name: Authentik
apps.description: Identity provider for SSO, service accounts and short lived sessions across my stack.

apps.name: Scanopy (NetVisor)
apps.description: Network visualisation and device inventory — small internal dashboard for LAN topology and device data.

apps.name: Raspberry Pi 4B
apps.description: Small single-board computer running various lightweight services and edge integrations.
